# Player vision

```{r player-vision, fig.width=11, fig.height=6}
# Vision in a single dimension
ability <- data_frame(vision = 1:9)
gg_single_dimension <- ggplot(ability) +
  aes(vision, vision) +
  geom_bar(aes(alpha = vision), stat = "identity", fill = theme_colors[["blue"]]) +
  scale_x_continuous("", breaks = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous("vision", breaks = 1:10, expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_alpha_continuous(range = c(0.5, 1.0)) +
  guides(alpha = "none") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(1, 9.2), ylim = c(0, 9)) +
  base_theme +
  theme(panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank()) +
  ggtitle("Vision in a single dimension")

# Vision in two dimensions
data("differing_skills")

teams <- differing_skills %>%
  get_team_info() %>%
  gather(dimension, value, -c(team, player, team_id)) %>%
  recode_team() %>%
  select(-team)

legend_text <- data_frame(
  team_label_rev = factor(0, levels = 0:4),
  player = 1,
  value = c(0.1, 0.1),
  dimension = c("vision_x", "vision_y"),
  label = c("vision x", "vision y")
)

dodge_width <- position_dodge(width = 0.9)

tradeoffs_plot <- ggplot() +
  aes(x = player, y = value, group = dimension) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = team_label_rev, alpha = dimension),
           stat = "identity", position = dodge_width) +
  facet_wrap("team_label_rev", nrow = 1) +
  geom_text(aes(label = label), data = legend_text, position = dodge_width,
            angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 0) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1, 2)) +
  scale_y_continuous("vision", breaks = 1:10, expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  scale_alpha_manual(values = c(0.9, 0.5)) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 9)) +
  base_theme +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank()
  )

gg_two_dimensions <- (tradeoffs_plot %+% filter(teams, player == 1)) +
  scale_x_continuous("", labels = NULL) +
  theme(strip.text = element_blank()) +
  labs(title = "Vision in two dimensions")

# Player search areas
player_abilities <- data_frame(vision_x = 5:1, vision_y = 5:9) %>%
  mutate(vision = sprintf("(%s,%s)", vision_x, vision_y),
         vision = factor(vision, levels = vision))

player_search_areas <- player_abilities %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  do(calculate_player_search_area(.$vision_x, .$vision_y)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  left_join(player_abilities) %>%
  mutate(centroid = ifelse(x == 0 & y == 0, TRUE, FALSE))

gg_player_search_areas_plot <- ggplot(player_search_areas) +
  aes(x = x, y = y, fill = vision) +
  geom_tile(aes(alpha = centroid), height = 0.9, width = 0.9) +
  scale_x_continuous("vision x", labels = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous("vision y", labels = NULL, expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2", guide = "none") +
  scale_alpha_manual(values = c(1.0, 0.4), guide = "none") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-10, 10), ylim = c(-10, 10)) +
  facet_wrap("vision", nrow = 1, scales = "fixed") +
  base_theme +
  theme(
    strip.text = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )

# Number of search squares
n_search_squares <- player_search_areas %>%
  group_by(vision_x, vision_y, vision) %>%
  summarize(n_search_squares = n()) %>%
  ungroup()

gg_n_search_squares <- ggplot(n_search_squares) +
  aes(vision, n_search_squares, fill = vision) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_x_discrete("", breaks = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous("n search squares", expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2", guide = "none") +
  base_theme +
  ggtitle("Number of search squares")

grid.arrange(
  arrangeGrob(gg_single_dimension, gg_two_dimensions, gg_n_search_squares, nrow = 1),
  gg_player_search_areas_plot,
  ncol = 1
)
```

# Team vision

```{r team-vision, fig.width=11, fig.height=6}
gg_differing_skills <- (tradeoffs_plot %+% teams) +
  labs(title = "Two person teams varying in vision distribution") +
  theme(strip.text = element_blank())

# Team search areas
team_abilities <- data_frame(
    p1_vision_x = 5:1,
    p1_vision_y = 5:9,
    p2_vision_x = 5:9,
    p2_vision_y = 5:1
  ) %>%
  mutate(team_ability = sprintf("(%s,%s)+(%s,%s)", p1_vision_x, p1_vision_y,
                                                   p2_vision_x, p2_vision_y),
         team_ability = factor(team_ability, levels = team_ability))

team_search_areas <- team_abilities %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  do(calculate_team_search_area(.$p1_vision_x, .$p1_vision_y,
                                .$p2_vision_x, .$p2_vision_y)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  left_join(team_abilities) %>%
  count(team_ability, x, y) %>%
  group_by(team_ability) %>%
  mutate(pct_n = n/n()) %>%
  ungroup()

gg_team_search_areas <- ggplot(team_search_areas) +
  aes(x = x, y = y, fill = team_ability, alpha = pct_n) +
  geom_tile(width = 0.9, height = 0.9) +
  scale_x_continuous("vision x", labels = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous("vision y", labels = NULL) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2", guide = "none") +
  scale_alpha_continuous(range = c(0.3, 1), guide = "none") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-10, 10), ylim = c(-10, 10)) +
  facet_wrap("team_ability", nrow = 1, scales = "fixed") +
  base_theme +
  theme(
    strip.text = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )

# team_search_areas %>%
#   count(team_ability)

n_team_search_squares <- bind_rows(
    n_search_squares,
    list(vision = "all teams", n_search_squares = 441)
  ) %>%
  mutate(vision = factor(vision, levels = c(levels(player_abilities$vision), "all teams")))

gg_n_team_search_squares <- ggplot(n_team_search_squares) +
  aes(vision, n_search_squares, fill = vision) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  annotate("text", x = "all teams", y = 10, label = "all synchronic teams", angle = 90, hjust = 0) +
  scale_x_discrete("", breaks = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous("n search squares", expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2", guide = "none") +
  base_theme +
  ggtitle("Number of search squares")

grid.arrange(
  arrangeGrob(gg_differing_skills, gg_n_team_search_squares, widths = c(0.6, 0.4)),
  gg_team_search_areas,
  ncol = 1
)
```
